source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.
source_objects.title: Mobile Development

items.title: Learn iPad Development and Advanced iOS Programming
items.headline: Master advance iOS concepts like OpenGLES, GCD, Motion Sensors and Animation
objectives_summary: To Learn iPad Programming
To study and understand advance objective C concepts
To learn APIs like Motion Sensors and Location Sensors

items.title: Android: Using Backendless to save data in the cloud
items.headline: Learn how to add a powerful cloud database to your Android application.
objectives_summary: Design a fully fledged login screen with email verification and password reset
Create an online database from the Backendless.com website
Create new entries to the database, edit and delete existing entries from your Android application

items.title: Android App Components: Fragments & Background Services
items.headline: Master flexible UIs & build powerful background capabilities into Android apps, monitor your data streams & take action
objectives_summary: How to implement multiple code samples.
Learn how to send work requests to the background service.
Create layouts for multiple screens at runtime.

items.title: Make Your first Android App in 60 minutes FLAT with NO code
items.headline: Impress your friends and make your first Animal Sounds Android App with Zero prior experience in code
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will have a real live Animal Sounds Android App published on your phone to show off to the world
In this course you will learn how to install the tool to make Android Apps without knowing code
In this course you will learn how to layout, create and publish your Android app

items.title: Learn Cordova From Scratch - Visual Studio and Mac
items.headline: Build cross platform mobile apps for Android and iOS
objectives_summary: You will be able to create mobile applications using Cordova for both Android and iOS

items.title: Augmented Reality (AR) For Beginners: Create AR Apps Today!
items.headline: Learn how to use Vuforia & Unity AR to create amazing AR experiences, games and apps from scratch. For beginners!
objectives_summary: How to create an Augmented Reality (AR) app using Vuforia and Unity from scratch. Everything is covered step by step.
How to integrate Unity and Vuforia.
How to create good and optimal augmentable image targets.

items.title: Swift: Learn how to master Properties in just one hour

visible_instructors.title: Icaro Lavrador
visible_instructors.name: Icaro
visible_instructors.job_title: React, JavaScript, Node, Swift Expert | 25+ years Experience

items.headline: Swift properties is tricky, therefore, it is very important to have a solid understanding of Properties to master Swift
objectives_summary: Learn in all the details about properties in Swift

items.title: Snapchat Clone Masterclass With Flutter | Guided Project
items.headline: Learn to make the snapchat UI in flutter
objectives_summary: Flutter
Dart
UI development

items.title: Build Different Android Apps - Hands On Android Course

visible_instructors.title: Oak Academy
visible_instructors.name: Oak
visible_instructors.job_title: Web & Mobile Development, IOS, Android, Ethical Hacking, IT

items.headline: Android App development with real-life examples, build 5 android apps with android studio, improve your android skills!
objectives_summary: Due to its open-source nature, working with the Android platform necessitates constantly learning about the Android platform. My android development course on Udemy keeps you ahead of this learning curve, with hands-on lectures on Android operating systems and more.
In this course, we will building 5 different Android Apps from scratch together.
Android applications' levels in this course are from easy to difficult

items.title: Create a Photo Sharing iOS app with Firebase and Swift 4
items.headline: An advanced course from intermediate to expert
objectives_summary: Finishing a big project, learning app development best practices

items.title: Xamarin forms XAML - Novice to Expert
items.headline: Best way to learn Xamarin Forms is by starting with XAML
objectives_summary: Better understanding of XAML
Better understanding of laying out UI
Better knowledge of binding controls

items.title: whatsapp clone with video and audio call
items.headline: whatsapp  clone with video and audio in firebase firestore android studio
objectives_summary: You will learn a lot about android development
You will learn a lot about firebase development
You will learn a lot about webRtc framework

items.title: Make Your Own Pokemon Go Game For iOS 10
items.headline: Make your own Pokemon Go styled game and make millions just like Nintendo! Gotta Catch'em All!
objectives_summary: Students will be able to make their own Pokemon Go styled game, which they can implement with any other theme.

items.title: Android Jetpack: Room, Navigation and Data Binding
items.headline: Room database, Fragment Navigation and layout data binding
objectives_summary: Android Jetpack
Room database
Android Navigation

items.title: Learn Swift Programming to Make iOS Apps

visible_instructors.title: Gary Kind
visible_instructors.name: Gary
visible_instructors.job_title: Techie with Marketing and Business Startup Knowledge

items.headline: Swift is Apple's new programming language for building iOS and Mac applications.
objectives_summary: Become an Apple Developer (if you aren't already one)
Learn the basic constructs in the Swift language
Have the basis for being able to build your own apps with XCode and Swift

items.title: NativeScript with Angular code sharing
items.headline: One project that will build mobile apps on Android and iOS and web Angular app
objectives_summary: Will be able to create one codesharing project for all platforms
Will be able to make a cross platform mobile app
Will be able to create web app with Angular
